alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 25 at 12:22PM MST until December 27 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 3 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, and the Rampart Range below 7500 feet. * WHEN...From late tonight through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Roads may become slick and hazardous. Visibilities may drop below 1/4 mile due to falling and blowing snow. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning and evening commutes. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
